title: Sales Development Representative - German Speaking
content:
To reinvent an industry, you have to build the best team. Join Formlabs if you want to bring groundbreaking professional 3D printers to the desktop of every designer, engineer, researcher, and artist in the world. Our printers are used by Google, Tesla, Gillette, and New Balance, just to name a few.
Our Direct Sales team in EMEA is looking for a tech-savvy salesperson who will be a problem solver and listener with a customer-service focus. You will become a product specialist and product advocate. If you can build positive relationships with customers and help them with their sales or service-related questions, join our team as Sales Development Representative in our Budapest office.
 
Your challenge:

Proactively talking on the phone with prospects and existing customers
Using your customer focus skills to identify sales leads
Following up on inbound sales inquiries within the DACH region (phone and e-mail)
Managing, growing and nurturing our existing DACH account base
Understand customer demand and effectively, proactively sell additive manufacturing solutions
Ensuring high levels of customer satisfaction as well as up-sell and cross-sell potential within existing and future accounts
Be open to additional outbound sales activities
Driving sales with a solution-oriented approach
Organizing regular customer meetings to ensure customer delight and sales growth
Collaborating with key decision makers to identify opportunities and develop ideas that deliver sales results
Attending trade shows and hosting customer events
Monitoring market trends and providing regular competitor feedback

You:

Are a fluent in German and English
Have a min. 2-3 years of B2B sales experience
Have an affinity to avant-garde technologies and/or engineering
Are a relationship builder and are customer focused
Drive for results
Are able to work independently and would still thrive in a team environment

Bonus Skills:

Experience in serving our specific customer demographics - manufacturers, product designers, educators or engineers
Experience with Additive Manufacturing

We Offer:
 

Monthly Wolt credits (70000 HUF/month) for food delivery to the office
Private health insurance with Medicover
Shares in the company
Free beverages and snacks at the office
Unlimited 3D prints
A monthly or quarterly public transportation pass
An inclusive, dog-friendly office with diverse and inspiring colleagues
Development opportunities both in-house and off-site
Fun team events

 
We build amazing things. Come join us!
We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in our company.  We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.  
Even if you don't check every box, but see yourself contributing, please apply. Help us build an inclusive community that will change the face of 3D printing.
